name: Send CommCare form data to Google Sheets
description: Every time you receive a new response in the CommCare account, Make will automatically add selected data from the response to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses [this example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dsSBXgcPdeQgUNWUEnvTbcZIziufyF-Sbn0MIYsUSE0/edit?usp=sharing)
